A slap of cold air and the touch of icy water greet you as you feel yourself transported to a ledge overlooking a very choppy lake of water. 

The north wall is imposing and seems to crowd you off the ledge. You think you see something glinting in a crack in the wall. Holding it in your hands, you see it is broken. Can you fix it? The glow of the Source flares in your mind as you stumble away from the orb.
